longBusinessSummary: Lagnam Spintex Limited manufactures and sells cotton yarns in India and internationally. Its products are used in various applications, such as denims, terry towels, knitting, shirting, sheeting, sweaters, socks, weaving, bottom wear, home textile, and industrial fabrics. It also engages in production of yarn spun on perforated tubes; low twist, high RKM OE yarn; and low twist yarn in OE. Lagnam Spintex Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Bhilwara, India.
